about_the_game:
Please note that this is the DEMO version of the full game. You will only have a limited 2/8 character selection. Apart from that, you should be able to access the same server as the one in the full game.

[Back-story]
In a universe where even the mighty kami-sama seeks amusement, he orchestrates a grand tournament to determine the strongest hero. Transporting eight heroes to various random locations and eras on Earth, he watches their battles unfold with popcorn in hand from his couch.

[Alternative Back-story]
Amidst daily stress, a manga artist finds solace in his dreamland, where his characters spring to life from ink and paper. In this vibrant realm, his creations reflect his inner struggles and aspirations. Their epic battles become a canvas for confronting his fears and frustrations, transforming his dreams into a sanctuary of creativity and catharsis.

Illustrative, Anime-Styled Characters and VFX:

Feature: Unique, anime-inspired player characters and special effects that visually captivate and engage players.
Realistic and Anime-Blended Environments:

Feature: Familiar, real-world environments combined with anime aesthetics, creating an immersive and visually stunning play area.
Dynamic Boss Raids and Events:

Feature: Special raids and in-game events that enhance skills and increase damage, providing new challenges and excitement during battles.
Expanded Player Capacity (Up to 16 Players):

Feature: Increased player slots to support up to 16 participants, allowing for more intense and competitive gameplay experiences.
Character Customization and Monetization:

Feature: Diverse outfit options for characters, enabling extensive customization and providing monetization opportunities through in-game purchases.
Robust and Secure Gameplay:

Feature: Advanced security measures to ensure fair play and prevent cheating, maintaining a balanced and enjoyable gaming environment.
PlayFab Multiplayer System:

Feature: Integration of PlayFab for competitive ranking, matchmaking, and multiplayer system enhancements, ensuring a smooth and competitive online experience.

In-House Motion Capture Systems:
Feature: Custom motion capture technology for creating unique movesets and animations, distinguishing our game from competitors who rely on off-the-shelf solutions.

name: Madness Arena Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3 GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (3.4 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080p / 60fps / Low Quality Settings
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 (2.8 GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 7 1800X (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080p / 60fps / High Quality Settings
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Enter the ultimate battleground, where chaos reigns and survival is everything. Every decision could be your last—will you rise to the challenge or descend into madness? Master powerful abilities, crush your enemies, and prove your worth in Madness Arena.
